description: Try our easy to follow Sweet Chilli Chicken With Buckwheat Soba Noodle Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sweet Chilli Chicken With Buckwheat Soba Noodle Salad
name: Sweet Chilli Chicken With Buckwheat Soba Noodle Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add noodles, cabbage, carrot and spring onion. Add half the coriander. Add dressing and toss to combine. Serve garnished with remaining coriander and sliced chilli.
